mapper.select: SELECT c.common_no, c.name AS commonName, c.common_kind, c.image, c.content FROM common_item c ORDER BY c.common_no
SELECT c.common_no, c.name AS commonName, c.common_kind, c.image, c.content, c.date_select FROM common_item c WHERE c.common_no = #{commonNo}

SELECT r.common_kind, r.common_name, r.reser_date, r.reser_start_time, r.reser_end_time, FIND_CODE(r.USAGE_STATUS) USAGE_STATUS, r.reser_no, r.content, c.image FROM reser r JOIN common_item c ON r.common_no = c.common_no WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY r.reser_date DESC

SELECT r.reser_date ,TO_CHAR(r.reser_start_time, 'HH24:MI') AS reser_start_time ,TO_CHAR(r.reser_end_time, 'HH24:MI') AS reser_end_time ,c.image FROM reser r JOIN common_item c ON r.common_no = c.common_no WHERE c.common_no = #{commonNo} and r.reser_start_time >= trunc(sysdate)
AND r.reser_no != #{reserNo}

SELECT r.COMMON_KIND ,r.RESER_DATE ,r.RESER_START_TIME ,r.RESER_END_TIME ,r.RESER_AVAILABILITY ,r.CONTENT ,r.RESER_NO ,r.USER_NO ,r.COMMON_NAME ,r.COMMON_NO ,r.USAGE_STATUS ,c.image FROM reser r JOIN common_item c ON r.common_no = c.common_no WHERE r.reser_no = #{reserNo}
